title.rendered: Job Opening In Naseerabad For Balochistan Police In August 2024

content.rendered:
Job Opening In Naseerabad For Balochistan Police In August 2024. A career in the security sector is available at the Balochistan Police Naseerabad Range. Various positions within the police department are actively recruiting qualified candidates.

For various roles within its department, the Balochistan Police Naseerabad Range is currently seeking applications from highly motivated individuals.

Balochistan Police Naseerabad Range Jobs applications are due by 05 October 2024. The minimum salary starts at 35000 rupees per month and rises to 45000 rupees per month.

Publish your job ads on Statesaga.com by contacting us

Job Opening In Naseerabad For Balochistan Police In August 2024

Date Posted: 17 August, 2024
Last Date: 05 October, 2024
Category: Government
Newspaper: Jang Jobs
Education: Primary, Middle, Intermediate, Bachelor’s degree, I.com, DAE, BS, ICS
Location: Naseerabad, Balochistan, Pakistan
Organization: Balochistan Police
Job Industry: Security Jobs
Job Type: Full Time

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Islamabad Exim Bank Job in 2024
  • NASTP Jobs in Islamabad, 2024
  • Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024

>Job Opening In Naseerabad For Balochistan Police. For the following vacancies advertised in the daily Jang dated 17 August, Naseerabad and Quetta Balochistan Police are seeking applications. The positions will be located in Naseerabad and Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan.

Middle school, primary school, intermediate school, BA, DAE, I.com, and bachelor’s degrees are required.

Government jobs in Police, Security, and other areas will be available until 5 October 2024 or until the closing date is specified in the newspaper advertisement. Visit the Balochistan Police’s website for more information and to apply for the latest job openings. Persons with disabilities

Balochistan Police Security Jobs Application Process

Learn how to apply for security jobs at the Police, from submission requirements to interview procedures. Become a top candidate by showcasing your skills, experience, and commitment to public service.

Security Professional Responsibilities at Police Understand the core responsibilities of being a security professional at the police. To maintain order and protect lives and property, we need courage, integrity, and a strong sense of duty.
